1.speaker: A
sentence: You look worried. What's bothering you?

2.speaker: B
sentence: I think I'm feeling a little left out at work
내 생각에 난 조금 소외감을 느끼고 있어 일터에서

3.speaker: A
sentence: Don't be frustrated. Time heals all wound.

4.speaker: B
sentence: Will you back me up when i talk in the meeting?
너 내게 맞장구쳐줄 수 있니 내가 말할 때 회의에서?
